snippet: CURLEY--Walter J.P. The Board of Directors and employees of Fiduciary Trust Company International mourn the passing of our former board member and friend, Ambassador Curley--a diplomat, world class communicator and business leader. We send condolences to his wife, Mary, and his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CURLEY--Walter J.P. The Board of Directors and employees of Fiduciary Trust Company International mourn the passing of our former board member and friend, Ambassador Curley--a diplomat, world class communicator and business leader. We send condolences to his wife, Mary, and his family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CURLEY, WALTER J.P
